channel.title: Sierra Hotel on Thomas Bundle Docs

item.title: Xray India
item.description:
Play: Xray - setup

  • hosts: webservers become: false vars: app_name: “xray_app” retry_count: 3

    tasks:

    • name: Ensure golf-task-1 is present ansible.builtin.file: path: /opt/xray/golf-task-1 state: directory

    • name: Template golf-task-1 config ansible.builtin.template: src: templates/golf-task-1.j2 dest: /etc/xray/golf-task-1.conf mode: ‘0644’

    Description:

    Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

    handlers:

    • name: restart xray service ansible.builtin.service: name: xray state: restarted

Notes

Praesent sapien massa, convallis a pellentesque nec, egestas non nisi. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum. Curabitur non nulla sit amet nisl tempus convallis quis ac lectus. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
